short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide all instances of Trea Turner's name

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension hides all instances of Trea Turner's name from view in order to restore the quantum balance.

Inspired by http://www.gaslampball.com/2015/2/26/8114543/quantum-baseball-physics-what-happens-when-a-player-to-be-named-later
